name: Pork Loin
details: Overdrive PedalThe Way Huge Pork Loin overdrive pedal lets you dial in a combination of great-sounding overdrive and sparkling clean tones — from articulated grit to thick, sustaining crunch. The versatile Pork Loin Pedal features an Overdrive knob, a passive Tone circuit, a Curve corner-frequency control, and a Volume knob. Use the Clean knob to bring British-voiced clean tones to the mix, and you've got a ton of possibilities from this box. Want even more? Adjustable mini-controls are accessible inside the Pork Loin, for truly customized tones.
